ARTICLE I
DEFINITIONS

Section 1.01. Certain Defined Terms.
"Applicable Rate": the percentage margin set forth in the pricing grid.
"Indebtedness" means obligations for borrowed money and letter of credit obligations.

ARTICLE VI
NEGATIVE COVENANTS

Section 6.01. Limitation on Debt.
(a) Borrower may incur debt listed on Schedule 6.01.
(b) Borrower may not incur any additional debt except as otherwise permitted.
